item.title: Family Movie Night and Resource Fair on July 15th, 2022
item.author: Communications Hill Neighborhood Association
item.description: Join us for an exciting Family Movie Night and Resource Fair in the park!

item.title: Communications Hill School Update
item.author: Communications Hill Neighborhood Association
item.description: With the June 28th, 2022 board meeting, the Franklin McKinley School District has released a draft of the Preliminary Environmental Assessement (PEA) report.

item.title: Almaden Expressway Safety Meeting
item.author: Communications Hill Neighborhood Association
item.description: The City of San Jose’s Department of Transportation is hosting a virtual walk audit on June 29th, 2022 at 6pm.

item.title: Construction Updates

item.description: A new page for construction updates has been added.
